original_text: But Jehu did not turn aside from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, which he made Israel to sin—that is, the golden calves that were in Bethel and in Dan.
korean_text: 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄 곧 벧엘과 단에 있는 금송아지를 섬기는 죄에서는 떠나지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But Jehu did not turn aside from the sins
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여호야는 그 죄에서 돌이키지 않았다

sentences.original_text: of Jeroboam the son of Nebat,
which he made Israel to sin—
that were in Bethel and in Dan.
